data.title: The Aster
data.meta_description: The Aster is a private members club and boutique hotel (35-keys) in Hollywood at the epicenter of digital media streaming and content creation demand drivers. It is situated in an irreplaceable location at the intersection of Hollywood and Vine St....
data.text:
Los Angeles, CA

The Aster is a private members club and boutique hotel (35-keys) in Hollywood at the epicenter of digital media streaming and content creation demand drivers.

It is situated in an irreplaceable location at the intersection of Hollywood and Vine St.

The Property features a rooftop deck and restaurant with irreplaceable views of Capitol Records and the Hollywood sign with amenities such as a gym, pool, screening room, recording studio, and creative office space.

.
